comments:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #103867 +++

After recent updates, every time I open an XML with a xmlns declaration I get the
An internal error occurred during: "Processing Dirty Regions". dialog.

It wouldn't be so bad it this was just logged to the console, as I could ignore it, but as it is it makes editing XML documents impossible.
Can you give more information about what version you're using, what's installed now that wasn't before, etc?

I saw the same behaviour while editing JSP pages until I disabled JBoss Eclipse IDE 1.6.0.GA.

From the error log:
eclipse.buildId=M20060629-1905
java.version=1.5.0_07

John, I need more info about the errors.  Are there any stack traces?

The traces from comment 2 and comment 3 look unrelated, or at least not a problem caused within the editors themselves.
